about_the_game:
This Pack includes:

  • Leopard 2A4M CAN (Rank 7 Germany);

  • Premium account for 20 days;

  • 2500 Golden Eagles.

The Leopard 2A4M CAN is a modernized Canadian variant purchased from the Royal Netherlands Army, currently in service with Canada’s only tank regiment.

This variant is drastically more advanced than the standard 2A4 model, featuring a coating of composite armor protecting the sides of the hull and turret, complete with camo netting. The rear is protected by slat armor, which can defeat chemical rounds, while the underside is protected with extra plating to guard against explosions under the tank. You also have the option to remove these kits to reduce weight. Firepower is also improved; this variant can fire the advanced KE-W APFSDS round and comes with high-quality thermals, helping you identify and dispatch enemy tanks with ease.

A powerful modernization, Leopard 2A4M sports excellent armor, mobility, and firepower, making it ideal for effectively all combat roles.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
Note!

This product cannot be purchased for PlayStation® or Xbox accounts!

This DLC will only be granted to the Steam account that was used to make the purchase. If you have some issues, please contact our support (login on the website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • Leopard 2A4M CAN (Rank 7 Germany);

  • Premium account for 20 days;

  • 2500 Golden Eagles.

The Leopard 2A4M CAN is a modernized Canadian variant purchased from the Royal Netherlands Army, currently in service with Canada’s only tank regiment.

This variant is drastically more advanced than the standard 2A4 model, featuring a coating of composite armor protecting the sides of the hull and turret, complete with camo netting. The rear is protected by slat armor, which can defeat chemical rounds, while the underside is protected with extra plating to guard against explosions under the tank. You also have the option to remove these kits to reduce weight. Firepower is also improved; this variant can fire the advanced KE-W APFSDS round and comes with high-quality thermals, helping you identify and dispatch enemy tanks with ease.

A powerful modernization, Leopard 2A4M sports excellent armor, mobility, and firepower, making it ideal for effectively all combat roles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7
  • Processor:2,2 GHz
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 6XXX series or higher; AMD Radeon 1XXX series or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:Dual-Core 2,4 GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 460 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 MB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
